author: for3ternity
content:
hi I am reading a lot of people got their withdrawal credentials compromised, googling i estimate tens or hundred of millions in USD
would it be possible before spectra to have a minor fork where those with both withdrawal and validator credentials could change their 0x01 withdrawal address?

author: empir.ether
content: No, the migration from 0x00 to 0x01 is a one time process and the Ethereum address set cannot be changed. Please make this migration with the utmost care. Note, this can either be an externally-owned account (EOA) or a smart contract.

author: for3ternity
content:
Ok poor guys and girls
In principle is what I propose possible and can you estimate how difficult it is? Just curious

author: _shemnon
content: The principal is that irregular state changes should never be done again.  This would be an irregular state change.

author: for3ternity
content:
Ok so it's a principle
I understand
It's not simple to do another exception to this, so why take the risk
